QuestData.Title: Journey to Astranaar
QuestData.Description: $n, go to Astranaar. I'm sure an eager member of the Alliance such as you can do some real good there. Speak with Shindrell Swiftfire and offer your services.$B$BBut don't bother mentioning who sent you. Shindrell does not know me...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Shindrell Swiftfire in Astranaar.
QuestData.RewardText: You are here to offer your services to the Alliance, $N? We welcome the aid, for although its beauty remains... Ashenvale Forest is not the peaceful place it once was.
